title: Booklet, "Booklet for "A Program for the New Whitney Museum of American Art"", 1964
medium: Lithography in black, red and blue ink on off-white shiny wove paper
inscribed: Imprinted on cover across the top in black ink: A program for the New Whitney Museum of American Art
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Both covers have a design of a square broken down into sections of black, red and two sections of blue. Inside is a description of the museum and its floor plan, images and text throughout.

tombstone.epitaph:
Booklet, "Booklet for "A Program for the New Whitney Museum of American Art"", 1964.
1964. Lithography in black, red and blue ink on off-white shiny wove paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-128-a.
